attributes.action: abolish means testing of all Government paid benefits in Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I gather that means testing has already been modified in both N Ireland and Wales.In the scheme of things means testing is a crude tool to prevent many people from obtaining benefits that they have already contributed towards. As the modification of the use of means testing appears to be on national jurisdictions I would move that the removal of means testing be introduced to Scotland.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
